name: Scarf (itch) (Nizart)
description:
Your objective is to get Scarf, the main character, through the level, avoiding the cameras, spikes and deadly poison and collectiong five gold ingots that are spread throughout the map.

Move around with arrow keys.

Press X to restart.

Hold C to show map.

You can grap to a wall and jump to make a walljump.

You can jump against the ceiling and hold the jump-button to hang from the ceiling.

You can move while hanging.

I recommend listening to the mission impossible soundtrack while playing.

Warning: This game is extremly hard.
